name: Shadowing the Darkness
description:
Explore all the forest while keeping your torch alive.

After some time since The Coming, all human live has been eaten by the darkness, except you. Your resources are very low and staying's not an option. You must explore.

Avoid the dangers hidden in the woods and keep the flame on.

There are beasts searching for the very few humans that are still alive nowadays, and you are in their territory. Face them and pay with your light.
